titles.title: To extend protections to part-time workers in the areas of family and medical leave and to ensure equitable treatment in the workplace.
To extend protections to part-time workers in the areas of family and medical leave and to ensure equitable treatment in the workplace.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on House Administration, Oversight and Government Reform, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
